name: Blazing Snow (itch)
description:
Grab your weapon and prepare to fight hordes of evil snowmen. How long can you survive?

Input:

keyboard + mouse and controller

Controls: 

ActionKeyboardXbox ControllerMoveWASDLeft Stick
AimMouseRight StickShootLeft ClickRight TriggerJumpSpace BarASprintLeft ShiftL3


Tips:

1. Prioritize the red snowmen as they can move faster than you.

2. Watch your back. Snowmen might sneak up behind you.

3. When they surround you, jump and shoot them from above!

Installation Instructions

1. Download the game

2. Extract the contents of BlazingSnow.zip

3. Run Snow.exe

Requires a gaming PC. Developed and tested with a RTX 2070 Max-Q. If it works on something lower, please let me know in the comments.
